artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Aritaya Seiemon
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 245, horizontal yotsugiri #02.05, .07, .09, .10
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Twelve Views of Edo (Edo jūnikei 江戸十二景)
text: Uncut ōban of four horizontal yotsugiri. The complete set comprises twelve yotsugiri, printed on three ōban.
title: Evening Snow at Shinobazu, Autumn Moon at Takanawa, Night Rain over Sumida River, Sunrise at Suzaki
